alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 5:09AM CDT until June 15 at 6:30AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Holmes County in central Mississippi... Northeastern Yazoo County in central Mississippi... * Until 630 AM CDT. * At 509 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Eden, or 10 miles north of Yazoo City, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Eden around 515 AM CDT. Tolarville around 525 AM CDT. Coxburg around 530 AM CDT. Brozville around 540 AM CDT. Ebenezer around 545 AM CDT. Vaughan around 600 AM CDT. Goodman and Pickens around 605 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
